item.description:
Hi Everyone,

For April's brunch, let's go to Newport and visit The White Horse Tavern.

Here's there website:

http://www.whitehorsetavern.us/index.htm

Be sure to check out their brunch menu. 

http://www.whitehorsetavern.us/brunch.htm

I"ve made a reservation for 10.  Hope you can make it.

 

White Horse Tavern awards:

"Best Place to Impress a Visitor" - Rhode Island Monthly Magazine

"Best Wine List" - Newport Life Magazine

"Award of Excellence" - Wine Spectator

"Best Restaurant in Rhode Island" - New England Travel Guide (Boston Magazine)

"Best Service in Rhode Island" - Rhode Island Monthly Magazine

"Most Romantic Restaurant" - Newport Life Magazine

"Editor's Pick" - Yankee Magazine

"Best Table in the Winter" - Rhode Island Magazine
item.how_to_find_us: A reservation has been made in my name
item.name: April Brunch - The White Horse Tavern in Newport
